cont.title: Internationalization Example
cont.text: Svelte Semantic UI supports 14 locales out of the box. This example add 4 more locales and demonstrates how to modify a locale. Additionally the example provides UI transaltion for Spanish and French. It defaults to English for other locales.
menu.notification: You have {{count:gt; 0:{{count}} new {{count; 1:message; default:messages}}!; default:no messages :( }}
